summary: This is a small mod which replaces the large purple ball effect that occurs when a creature is summoned, with an effect that looks a lot more subtle and arcane. There is a video int he description to see the effect in action.
descriptionHtml:
This is a small mod which replaces the large purple ball effect that occurs when a creature is summoned, with an effect that looks a lot more subtle and arcane. 

I always hated that purple ball thing and I am sure others do too.

An excellent video by Nozi87 showing the differences:
[youtube]idA7G8jjnzE[/youtube]

A big thankyou to MCD for reviewing my mod! :)
[youtube]UfAtDbixMCk[/youtube]

Featured on Skyrim Mod Sanctuary!
[youtube]8A7cMHHbgoo[/youtube]

This mod is also featured by SkyttsTV!:
[youtube]ftkpwedoGEg[/youtube]

And now my lame video:
[youtube]tqb6t4TbZmU[/youtube]

Tell me what you think in the comments. Send in your pics of this mod in action and I will put them in the thread!
author: TheGreyLight
